about_the_game:
Step into a realm of sizzling allure with our latest Steam game DLC: "Hot Home Pajamas." Elevate your in-game fashion with this scintillating collection of seductive attire, meticulously designed to awaken the goddess within. Embrace the tantalizing blend of comfort and sensuality as you slip into a curated selection of lingerie-inspired sleepwear that transcends the boundaries of virtual allure.

Indulge in the luxurious textures and intricate lace details that adorn the Hot Home Pajamas, each piece crafted to accentuate your avatar's curves and radiate an irresistible charm. Whether you're lounging in the digital comfort of your virtual abode or strutting through the in-game nightlife, these bewitching garments guarantee to turn heads and leave admirers in awe.

Dive into a fantasy world where elegance meets desire, and every movement is a mesmerizing dance of grace. The Hot Home Pajamas DLC isn't just about clothing; it's a statement of confidence, an ode to the magnetic allure that only the perfect ensemble can evoke. Allow the soft fabrics to caress your avatar's skin, while the subtle yet provocative design sets the stage for unforgettable moments in your gaming journey.

Unleash your inner seductress or charismatic charmer as you don the Hot Home Pajamas, defining a new era of in-game style. This DLC isn't just an addition to your wardrobe; it's an investment in your avatar's confidence, turning every virtual encounter into a memorable rendezvous. Elevate your gaming experience, embrace the allure, and make a bold statement with the Hot Home Pajamas DLC – because in the world of pixels, glamour knows no bounds.

content_descriptors.notes: Some of the game's costumes may be hot, but the game does not contain nudity, genitals are not exposed, and it does not contain any sexual scenes.

name: Alien Agent X DLC Hot Home Pajamas
short_description: Introducing "Hot Home Pajamas" DLC—a blend of comfort and allure. Luxurious lingerie-inspired attire, intricate details redefine virtual style. Embrace confidence, turn heads, and ignite desire in-game. Unleash glamour without bounds.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Arabic, Korean
*languages with full audio support
